Name: The Final Forge
Desc: Together, "War" and "The Bloodsworn" reclaimed the Halo Cannon and defeated the manipulated Iron Army. People have united under their leadership and initiated a greater war against the imperious Sanctuary.

Name: Abyssal Embers
Desc: Together, "Death" and "The Bloodsworn" dispelled the Angels in Hell. Now, to save the flooded Valley of Ash, the two have set out on a path of vengeance against the Sanctuary.

Name: Soft Amber
Desc: The Pestilence Knight and the Bloodsworn together destroy the cocoon left behind by the Cardinal Deity. Determined to find a way to end the calamity for all humanity, they set out on a shared journey of redemption to purge the world of its poison.

Name: Bottled Snow
Desc: The Famine Knight and the Bloodsworn shatter the "Golden Law" that oppresses the world and renew their blood oath. With the goal of dragging the Supreme Heaven from the throne, they begin a new round of the grand gamble.
